summary: An ordinance providing for the proper maintenance of the Center Parking Strip in 43rd Avenue Northeast from East 38th Street to East 45th Street, for a period of five (5) years only; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13681 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
